          <title>
            <string language="en">Balanced equation for the reaction of benzoic acid with sodium hydroxide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausgeglichene Gleichung für die Reaktion der 
Benzoesäure mit Natriumhydroxid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Équation équilibrée pour la réaction de

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Equação equilibrada para a reação do ácido 
benzoic com hydroxide do sodium</string>

benzoico con l'idrossido del sodio</string>

οξέος με το υδροξείδιο νατρίου</string>

ácido benzoico con el hidróxido del sodio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the balanced equation for the reaction of benzoic acid with sodium hydroxide.</string>
          </description>
